EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_11/12/13Launch_Q413.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: You are registered for our exclusive event on Nov 12
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to join us for this exclusive announcement scheduled for 10:00 AM PST on November 12, 2013! Enterprises are being driven to compete, innovate & execute faster than ever before. They must achieve Global reach and service emerging markets while faced with ever-increasing customer expectations. To achieve this, they must build great software. You will hear examples from key Pivotal executives and our customers and partners - some of the world's great software companies.
We look forward to you joining us, The Pivotal Team
Check out Pivotal P.O.V. Visit Our Blog >> <http://blog.gopivotal.com/>
What's New at Pivotal? Read Now >> <http://www.gopivotal.com/resources>
Follow Us: Twitter <http://www.twitter.com/gopivotal> | LinkedIn <http://www.linkedin.com/company/gopivotal> | Facebook <http://www.facebook.com/gopivotal> | Google+ <https://plus.google.com/105320112436428794490>
